sense.gloss: to be able to receive, to be able to take, to be able to accept
to be able to eat, to be able to drink
to be acceptable, to be satisfactory
x: 頂けない・いただけない

sdata.j: お↑返事|↑↓へんじ↓↑頂↑↓いただ↓ける|のを↑楽↑↓たの↓しみにしております。
sdata.e: I'm looking forward to hearing from you.

sdata.j: これはきっと↑気↑↓き↓に↑入↑↓い↓って|↑頂↑↓いただ↓ける|と↑思↑↓おも↓います。
sdata.e: We hope this will be to your satisfaction.

sdata.j: いいですね。ムワンザに↑着↑↓つ↓いたらすぐにでも、↑私↑↓わたし↓まで↑一↑↓いち↓↑筆|↑↓ぴつ↓↑頂↑↓いただ↓ける|と↑幸↑↓さいわ↓いです。
sdata.e: Fine. I'd be very happy if you would drop me a line as soon as you get to Mwanza.
